cardButtons.text: Click here to view Alex Hormozi, a reputable millionaire that gives sound advice on how to accumulate wealth and financial freedom through knowledge and hard work. He is focused on product-based business models.
Click here to view Jeff Nippard, a renouned science-based bodybuilder who cites studies to back up how to most optimally gain muscle, accrue strength, and optimise your workouts.
Click here to view Ali Abdaal, a former doctor now turned productivity content creator. It was from him that I learned the art of studying and business / entrepreneurial information.

index.title: Your first step to bettering yourself
index.quote: You have made the leap to improve yourself, whether it's financial, career-wise, or simply building better habits. This is a landing page of collated resources and advice that have aided me in pursuing a greater version of myself. I hope it can be of help, for these things have helped me to strive for greatness.

contact.title: Contact Silent Improvement
contact.intro: To contact us directly please send an email to the address provided:

about.title: About Silent Improvement
about.intro: The mission of Silent Improvement is to create a centralized hub of self-improvement information on finance, physical fitness, learning a language, web development, or study techniques.
about.quote: Our aim is to filter through the misinformation that is littered on the internet and only provide information that has worked personally for those at Silent Improvement.

resources.title: Resources
resources.intro: On this page is a collation of all the useful resources that have contributed to improvement from all areas
